zapaddon.name: Ajax Spider
zapaddon.description: Allows you to spider sites that make heavy use of JavaScript using Crawljax
zapaddon.author: ZAP Dev Team
zapaddon.changes:
In addition to Maximum crawl depth and Event wait time, added Max Crawl states, max duration, reload wait time and 'click elements once' as options to be configurable by a user (Issue 945) Added table to choose which elements to click and added 'click default only' option (issue 1177).
A warning message is shown if the selected browser was not successfully started.
